item.title: By: brian
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Scoffing braggart! Actually, and completely by chance, I re-read it on the bus last week and was so captivated I almost missed my stop... If only our writing could be this shit-hot.
item.content:encoded: Scoffing braggart! Actually, and completely by chance, I re-read it on the bus last week and was so captivated I almost missed my stop… If only our writing could be this shit-hot.

item.title: By: Herge
item.dc:creator: Herge
item.description: What a load of bollocks. If you want to know what revolution is all about I suggest you look at my <a href="http://tintinrevolution.free.fr/pages/image001.html" rel="nofollow">site</a>.
item.content:encoded: What a load of bollocks. If you want to know what revolution is all about I suggest you look at my site.
